from django.urls import path
from .views import HomePageView, AddEventView, EditEventView, DeleteEventView, ListEventsView, EventDetailsView, HelpView


urlpatterns = [
    """
    URL patterns for the application.
    """
    path('', HomePageView.as_view(), name='home'),
    path('calendar/add-event/', AddEventView.as_view(), name='add_event'),
    path('calendar/edit-event/<int:event_id>/', EditEventView.as_view(), name='edit_event'),
    path('calendar/delete-event/<int:event_id>/', DeleteEventView.as_view(), name='delete_event'),
    path('calendar/view-events/', ListEventsView.as_view(), name='view_events'),
    path('calendar/view-event-details/<int:event_id>/', EventDetailsView.as_view(), name='view_event_details'),
    path('help/faq/', HelpView.faq, name='faq'),
    path('help/user-guide/', HelpView.user_guide, name='user_guide'),
]

import calendar
from datetime import datetime

from django.db.models import Q
from django.shortcuts import render, redirect, get_object_or_404
from django.views import View
from django.http import HttpResponse
from django.contrib import messages

from .forms import EventForm
from .models import Event


class HomePageView(View):
    """
    Handles rendering of the home page.
    """

    def get(self, request):
        """
        Displays the calendar with events for the selected month and year.
        """


class AddEventView(View):
    """
    Handles adding new events to the calendar.
    """


class EditEventView(View):
    """
    Handles modifying existing events in the calendar.
    """


class DeleteEventView(View):
    """
    Handles deleting events from the calendar.
    """


class ListEventsView(View):
    """
    Handles displaying and searching the list of events.
    """


class EventDetailsView(View):
    """
    Handles displaying detailed information about a selected event.
    """


class HelpView:
    """
    Handles the help and support sections.
    """

    @staticmethod
    def faq(request):
        """
        Displays frequently asked questions.
        """

    @staticmethod
    def user_guide(request):
        """
        Offers a detailed guide on how to use the application.
        """
